Returns: the property value, or Long.MIN_VALUE if not supported.
Parameters: int: identifier of the requested property
getLongProperty(int).Description: Return the value of a battery property of long type If the platform does not provide the property queried, this value will be Long.MIN_VALUE.

isCharging().Description: Return true if the battery is currently considered to be charging. This means that the device is plugged in and is supplying sufficient power that the battery level is going up (or the battery is fully charged). Changes in this state are matched by broadcasts of @B_android#os#BatteryManager#ACTION_CHARGING_E@ and @B_android#os#BatteryManager#ACTION_DISCHARGING_E@.

Returns: how much time is left, in milliseconds, until the battery is fully charged or -1 if the computation fails
computeChargeTimeRemaining().Description: Compute an approximation for how much time (in milliseconds) remains until the battery is fully charged. Returns -1 if no time can be computed: either there is not enough current data to make a decision or the battery is currently discharging.

Returns: the property value. If the property is not supported or there is any other error, return (a) 0 if targetSdkVersion < VERSION_CODES.P or (b) Integer.MIN_VALUE if targetSdkVersion >= VERSION_CODES.P.
Parameters: int: identifier of the requested property
getIntProperty(int).Description: Return the value of a battery property of integer type.

ClassDesc: The BatteryManager class contains strings and constants used for values in the @B_android#content#Intent#ACTION_BATTERY_CHANGED_E@ Intent, and provides a method for querying battery and charging properties.
